snippet: The photo agency has decided to allow noncommercial websites and social media users to publish its images at no cost using an “embedding” tool.
abstract: Getty Images decides to allow noncommercial websites and social media users to publish the photo agency's images at no cost using an embedding tool.
lead_paragraph: The photo agency has decided to allow noncommercial websites and social media users to publish its images at no cost using an “embedding” tool.

headline.main: Getty to Let Bloggers and Others Use Photos Free
headline.print_headline: Getty Images to Open Its Archive
